page.title: 19DALLAM TOWERS
page.content:
The Dallam Tower estate covers most of the land around Milnthorpe.Within the estate there is woodland,parkland and farmland of which Dallam Towers owns numerouse farms.In the park,which is open to the public,200 sheep are kept. Aswell as the sheep,the main attraction of the park is the herd of 70 fallow deer.The trees in the park were all planted deliberately and the oldest trees are about 250 years old. Another characteristic of the park is the meandering River Bela which acts as a natural boundary for the park. In 1983 the main section of Dallam Towers caught fire causing considrable damage.The present owner of Dallam Towers is Brigadeer Tryon_Wilson.
Dallam Towers is not open to the public exept on open days and for charity events.
